534360.effect: These hidden troops of the Draconia Empire wield spears tipped with poison. They ambush any intruders from foreign lands, and serve to make Draconia a dangerous place for any who would bring it harm.

● During the Main Phase: You can target 1 card in either GY; equip it to this card.
● You can use Equip Cards you control as Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster.
● If a card equipped to this card is used for the Tribute Summon of a monster: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Blaster" once per turn.

1839476.effect:
You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. This card gains the following effects if it was Tribute Summoned or Special Summoned by the effect of a Tribute Summoned monster.
● During the Main Phase: You can equip the top card of either player's Deck to this card.
● You can use Equip Cards you control as Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster.

You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Warp" once per turn.

You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Void Engulfer" once per turn.
1825911.name: World Reaper Void Engulfer

You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY by Tributing up to 4 "World Reaper" monsters you control (min 2). You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. This monster gains effects based on the amount of monsters Tributed for its Tribute Summon.

1 "World Reaper" monster

2 Level 12 "World Reaper" monsters Tribute Summoned using 3+ Tributes

If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Attach that card to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Divine Judgement" once per turn.

1769587.effect: When the time was right, she'd strike. No matter the minute, nor the hour, she would wreak havoc and cause change in the world that is filled with despair.
1769587.name: Mari the Young Revolutionary

1769603.effect: Only he could know of what was possible. If word got out, then everything would go awry. He had to keep everything going, unless he wished hatred from his god.
1769603.name: Evisio the Drorar Savant

1769640.effect: Mari and Veria have always been great friends. When Veria isn't making fun of just how dense Mari always is, she longs for some quality alone time with her.
1769640.name: Veria, Mechashot Marvel

1769659.effect: Why is he here? Why must he live among people who he cares not for? What was the point of it all? He had so many questions. So, so many questions...
1769659.name: Atrias, Unfeeling Aeroleo
1769659.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 Machine Normal Monster from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck, and if you do, add 1 Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand that specifically lists that Special Summoned monster's name in its text, and if you do that, destroy this face-up card. You can only use this effect of "Atrias, Unfeeling Aeroleo" once per turn.

1769674.effect:
The intercom rang, "Sir, we have sights on a new threat."
The responder calls out, "A new threat? What's being locked?"
"We cant be certain, but we assume it to be some kind of ETB."
"Are you sure about that? What is it doing?"
"If I had to guess, I think its going to kill us." The com cut out.
1769674.name: BKR-MKIII Arc-W
1769674.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, then draw 1 card. All monsters you control must be Machine Normal Monsters to activate and resolve this effect (min. 1). You can only use this effect of "BKR-MKIII Arc-W" once per turn.

1769694.effect: Benevolence was arriving. A new world - a new reality - was upon them all, and they all knew it.
1769694.name: BKR-MKIII Arc-E
1769694.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone in face-up Defense Position. All monsters you control must be Machine Normal Monsters to activate and resolve this effect (min. 1). You can only use this effect of "BKR-MKIII Arc-E" once per turn.

1769719.effect:
"Mari the Young Revolutionary(s)" and "Veria, Mechashot Marvel(s)" you control gain 300 ATK/DEF, also they cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Forward, to Life Anew!" per turn, and only once that turn.
●When this card is activated: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 Machine Normal Monster from your hand or GY.
●If all monsters you control are Level 5 Machine Normal Monsters (min. 1): You can discard 1 card; draw 2 cards.

1769736.effect:
"BKR-MKIII Arc-W(s)" and "BKR-MKIII Arc-E(s)" you control gain 300 ATK/DEF, also cards you control with those names cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "And Thus, the War Continues..." per turn, and only once that turn.
●When this card is activated: You can add 1 Level 5 Machine Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.
●If you control a Level 5 Machine Normal Monster: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of the next turn.
1769736.name: And Thus, the War Continues...

Equip only to a Machine monster you control. This card gains the following effects, depending on the names of monsters you control.
●"Mari the Young Revolutionary": The equipped monster gains 500 ATK/DEF.
●"Evisio the Drorar Savant": The equipped monster can attack your opponent directly, but when it does so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is halved.
●"Veria, Mechashot Marvel": Monsters your opponent controls lose 300 ATK/DEF.

You can only use each effect of "Fors' Orb of Prosperity" once per turn.

●During the End Phase: Return this card to the Extra Deck, then shuffle 2 of your banished "BKR-MKIII" monsters into the Deck.
